培訓計畫目標/ Program Goal:
Utilizing educational technology tools, optimize learning and teaching skills for teachers and professors who intend to foster a learning environment that is prone to bilingual interactions.

報名資格/ Program Requirements for Participants:
•	Initial English Proficient Level: C1 preferred, but B2 is acceptable as well
•	Approval from administration
•	An earnest desire to contribute to the success of students and future participants
•	Commitment to mentor the next cohort of participants
•	Willingness to commit to a minimum of six hours of work per week

培訓時間/ Timeline & Class Size:
•	Recruitment of Participants: 60 days prior to the program start date
•	Participant commitment form: 30 days prior to the program start date (10/1/2024)
•	Training Duration: October 1, 2024 – December 6, 2024
o	One synchronous meeting per week, for two hours; four hours of homework/out-of-class work
•	Up to 12 participants

報名資訊/ Registration (免費報名)
•	Link to survey as part of registration (copy and paste into your browser)
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc1yeaZHkSV4cboKvUmSiWpCyAYO2ugZ0F6IuVIGJ8GN2-u9w/viewform?usp=sf_link

截止日期/ Deadline to submit: Friday, August 30th, 2024
